story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
If I understand correctly, you’d like to liven
up the Arceus Cup with a new format?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! Don’t you think now’s a good
opportunity to change things up?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Let’s hold a tournament in which all the
participants are Gym Leaders!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
If your goal is to liven things up, why restrict
who can participate?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Remember how in the last cup, I staked my
pride as a Gym Leader on a battle against
Giovanni and awakened my arc suit?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Apparently, that inspired lots of other Gym
Leaders to take on the Arceus Cup, too!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
They’re all champing at the bit to battle
other strong Trainers!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
So you want to structure the tournament to
be easier for them to participate?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Exactly! I knew you’d get it!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I was trying to figure out how to run a
tournament like that...
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: so I reached out to Clay here.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Lear. Do you know of a tournament I created
in Unova’s Driftveil City called the PWT?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
The PWT... That’s the Pokémon World
Tournament, correct?
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I’ve heard it’s a facility that holds
tournaments for strong Trainers from all
over the world.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Heh. Glad you’ve heard of it! That makes
convincin’ you easier.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
The main draw of the PWT is that each
tournament limits participants to specialists
of a specific type or folks with a certain title!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Runnin’ a similar tournament here means we
could do more than just Blue’s idea of a
Gym Leader–only tournament.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
We could use the same structure to hold
other themed tournaments, too!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Also, another thing that might sweeten
the deal...
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
is that the PWT is a spectacle—it brings in
spectator money!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Hey, Clay! We all know that’s not this
tournament’s REAL purpose!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I would expect no less from the Miner King
himself. I admire your business acumen.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I also think this’ll help more of us awaken
our arc suits.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Winning a tournament like the PWT means
everyone acknowledges you’ve made it to
the top of your class.
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
The journey to the top deepens Trainers’
bonds with their Pokémon!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
The next Arceus Cup shall be Pasio’s version
of the PWT!
story_arceus_08_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: Thanks! I owe you one, Lear!
